thread.title: USC fires football coach Steve Sarkisian following alcohol outburst

title: USC fires football coach Steve Sarkisian following alcohol outburst
text:
USC fires football coach Steve Sarkisian following alcohol outburst 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
USC has fired head football coach Steve Sarkisian five games into a season that began with an alcohol-fueled rant at a booster event in Augu...
